title: What can I as a citizen do to protest and bring attention to the opening of the cape fear memorial bridge during rush hour?  The bridge opened yesterday right at 5:00 and snarled traffic already backed up from the weather.  This seems senseless and stupid to delay thousands of motorists just to let one boat through the bridge.  NO MORE BRIDGE OPENINGS FROM 7-9am and 4-6pm ON WEEKDAYS!!!!!
